snippet.title: Phantom Brigade - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Phantom Brigade brings an innovative twist to the turn based RTS genre, with strategic prediction based systems and realistic physics. Would your Brigade survive against all odds? Or would your best laid plans fall apart?

Stay in touch! 
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/553540/Phantom_Brigade/ 
Epic Store Page: https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/product/phantom-brigade/home
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/PhantomBrigade_ 
Talk to us on Discord: https://discord.gg/braceyourselfgames
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/byg_vancouver/
